parameters.name: y
parameters.label: y
parameters.desc: A vector of strings (i.e. 'x1a-x1b,x2a-x2b' naming the pairs of interest in data. Here x1a,x1b is first pair, and x2a,x2b is the second pair.

parameters.name: hypothesis
parameters.label: hypothesis
parameters.desc: 'different', 'greaterthan' or 'lessthan',the alternative hypothesis; measure 1 different to measure 2, measure 1 greater than measure 2, and measure 1 less than measure 2 respectively.

parameters.name: pathology
parameters.label: pathology
parameters.desc: The name of the pathology in which the dataset belongs to.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.label: dataset
parameters.desc: The names of one or more datasets, in which the algorithm will be executed.
